original_text: So I poured out my wrath upon them for the blood that they had shed in the land, for the idols with which they had defiled it.
korean_text: 그들이 땅 위에 피를 쏟았으며 그 우상들로 말미암아 자신들을 더럽혔으므로 내가 분노를 그들 위에 쏟아

sentences.original_text: So I poured out my wrath upon them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 그들에게 나의 분노를 쏟았다

sentences.original_text: for the blood that they had shed in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 땅에서 흘렸던 피 때문에

sentences.original_text: for the idols with which they had defiled it
